divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my girlfriend doing things irrelevant to this story when I got out of the car to stretch. The sky was dark, of course seeing as it was in the middle of the night. As I was pacing I suddenly noticed a strange lack of noise. It felt like everything just kind of stopped. The I heard a very high pitched sound and looked up. While the sky was dark, a VERY large circle that was darker than the sky and contrasted well was just above me. It was perfectly still, as though it was a fixture in the sky. When my eyes focused and I fully recognized there was certainly an object above me, I couldn't look away. My girlfriend peeked out and was just as speechless as myself. I was still focused on the object when suddenly it felt like all the air just got sucked out of me. I stumbled and then sat down and the object just went up. I can't describe it any other way, it either got smaller or went straight up. Then it was just gone. I don't know what I do or don't believe, I just know what I saw. My girlfriend just cried and refused to discuss it. I was more confused than anything. I don't drink or do drugs. I still am completely baffled.
